intro.title: HEY, I'M WENDY TSAI
intro.subTitle: A Frontend Developer building the Frontend of Websites and Web Applications with Vue and React
about.title: about me
about.subTitle: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills mostly in terms of programming and technology
about.content1: I'm a Frontend Web Developer who loves programming and has proficiency in Chinese, English, and Thai.I have a wide range of interests and enjoy trying new things. I have learned video editing, Illustrator, Photoshop, and several musical instruments by myself. I have always been passionate about art, and to me, programming is a form of artistic expression. That's why I enrolled in an online full-stack course and discovered my love for programming, which led me to transition to a career as a front-end engineer.
about.content2: I am a self-taught and have gained experience with the React.js framework through project development at my previous company. I am also skilled at working across departments and understand how to communicate and coordinate effectively to produce high-quality work for the company.I believe that an excellent engineer should have a spirit of continuous learning and be able to apply what they have learned in practice, as well as have good observation skills in order to create user-friendly products. I believe I have these qualities and am confident that I can be a valuable asset to your company.
skills.title: My Skills
